<h1 align=center> Heart Rate Monitoring </h1>

An IoT based project, which let's user check the BPM (Beat Per Minute), and transfer the data to <a href='https://thingspeak.com/channels/2379004'>ThinkSpeak Channel</a>, for further analysis.

For more context check this <a href='#circuit-diagram'> Circuit Diagram</a>.

## Components Used

-   <a href='#esp8266-nodemcu-board'>ESP8266 NodeMCU Board</a>
-   <a  href='#oled-display' >OLED Display</a>
-   <a  href='#heartbeat-sensor-module' >Heartbeat Sensor Module</a> 
-   Breadboard
-   Jumper Wires
-   LED Lights
